Docs Forums

Tools

Tools, libraries and services that work nicely with Impact.

Point of Impact

A collection of all things related to the Impact game engine for developers. Games, tutorials, plugins, code snippets and much more.

Site: http://www.pointofimpactjs.com/

appMobi

Easily integrate and distribute your games into native iPhone and Android Apps. You don’t even need a Mac or XCode to get your game into the iPhone App Store.

The appMobi Game XDK comes bundled with Impact to get you started right away!

Site: http://appmobi.com/
